name: A Hopeful Play
description:
Game created for GBJam #9.

An epic adventure of a hero traveling between worlds. Help him to save the world!

There are fantastic dungeons, and platform levels that will be needed to complete your quest. And remember the golden rule in open-world games: Talk to everybody!

Controls:

  • Movement
    • Arrows
  • Action (Attack, Talk, Select option)
    • C

All art (pixel art, music, SFX) and coding made by Carlos_7x.
